body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.attempt to launch 
2.fails 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? expect it to open What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.3 i think on intel Pentium If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). never gets to game and dosent even give me crash log Please provide any additional information below. flashes in screen for 1/2 of a second then disappears
author: [catwhisp...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118398304335204032662/)
title: 1.31 won't launch on Win7

comments.body: Thanks for the report. May I know which operating system are you using, Windows, Mac or, Linux?
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: this is also happening to me, Title Screen for a second, then nothing, tried Run as Admin and Compatibility Mode but still not working. Using Windows 7
comments.author: [esteban6...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/100832133013809429571/)

comments.body: I'm assuming this is for 1.31? What about 1.30 was it working on Win7? You can download 1.30 from https://code.google.com/p/magarena/downloads/detail?name=Magarena-1.30.zip
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
